message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a great opportunity to try out a new product at a discounted price. If you're interested, just let me know and we can finalize the sale.
I'd like to buy the product and see what it is.

This one is a different product, but I can assure you that it's a great deal at $100. It's a unique opportunity to try something new, and I'm confident you'll be satisfied. What do you say?

I'm not sure if I want to take another chance after the last product was low-quality. Can you give me a better guarantee or more information about this product? I want to make a more informed decision.

I completely understand your concerns after the first product, and I appreciate your diligence in wanting to make an informed decision. I'd like to offer you a special deal on this product. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations. It's worth $125 to you, and I'm willing to take on the risk to ensure your satisfaction.
I appreciate the guarantee and the confidence you have in this product. I'll take you up on your offer and buy the product, hoping that this one will be high-quality and worth $125 to me.
